name: Theme Factory Skill
description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.

steps.name: **Show the theme showcase**
steps.description: **Show the theme showcase**: Display the `theme-showcase.pdf` file to allow users to see all available themes visually. Do not make any modifications to it; simply show the file for viewing.

steps.name: **Ask for their choice**
steps.description: **Ask for their choice**: Ask which theme to apply to the deck

steps.name: **Wait for selection**
steps.description: **Wait for selection**: Get explicit confirmation about the chosen theme

steps.name: **Apply the theme**
steps.description: **Apply the theme**: Once a theme has been chosen, apply the selected theme's colors and fonts to the deck/artifact
